summary: Through readings of historical account by actors and the testimony of survivors, the events of the Nanjing Massacre are recounted.
cast: Hugo Armstrong|Rosalind Chao|Stephen Dorff|John Getz|Mariel Hemingway|Michelle Krusiec|Chris Mulkey|Jürgen Prochnow|Sonny Saito|Graham Sibley|Mark Valley|Robert Wu|Woody Harrelson|Leah Lewis
title: Nanking
